pageContext.claim: “So we have low-income and distressed communities, and they're getting a tremendous incentive to have a lot of money going to those communities. And it's having a very, very big effect. It's been great.”
pageContext.analysis: The impact of the Opportunity Zones is not yet clear, according to the Tax Foundation. This is in part because key data collection requirements that would be needed to assess the progress were stripped from the final version of the bill.
